synopsis.text: A group of friends consisting of Funco, Ichiroku, Elle, Sig and possibly others embark on a fun summer camping trip in the mountains. During their adventure, they partake in several classic camping activities - fishing and relaxing by a river, smashing open a juicy watermelon, and soaking in a natural mountain hot spring they discover. As the trip winds down and the girls turn in for the night, Funco and Sig have a heartfelt moment where they make a promise to each other that their friendship will last forever. This wholesome slice-of-life anime follows a close-knit group of friends making memories together on a camping vacation in the great outdoors. Their bonding time filled with laughter, leisure and lighthearted moments will surely leave viewers feeling warm inside.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
